alert.note: Alert for Northwest Plateau (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 7:17AM MST until February 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Plateau. * WHEN...From Noon today to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire traction will be reduced. Extend the distance between your vehicle and the vehicle in front of you. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday evening and Wednesday morning commutes. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.
